description: This is an example configuration file for garage door

accessories.name: PUT THE NAME OF YOUR GARAGE DOOR OPENER HERE
accessories.url: PUT URL OF THE BROKER HERE
accessories.username: PUT USERNAME OF THE BROKER HERE (OR EMPTY)
accessories.password: PUT PASSWORD OF THE BROKER HERE  (OR EMPTY)
accessories.caption: PUT THE LABEL OF YOUR GARAGE DOOR OPENER HERE

topics.statusGet: PUT THE MQTT TOPIC FOR THE GETTING THE STATUS OF YOUR DOOR HERE
topics.statusSet: PUT THE MQTT TOPIC FOR THE SETTING THE TARGET STATE OF YOUR DOOR HERE
topics.obstructionGet: PUT THE MQTT TOPIC FOR THE GETTING THE OBSTRUCT DETECTION OF YOUR DOOR HERE
